root.name: Mush
root.description: OverviewIn Mush, the user controls how the character feels by using the touch screen and motion controls. Drawing a smile makes Mush happy, making him light and able to float. Drawing a sad face saddens Mush and makes him sink in water and weigh down objects. Shaking the phone angers Mush, allowing you to run faster and break obstacles.AwardsMush was nominated for the Ones to Watch Award at the 7th British Academy Video Games Awards (2011) after the developers competed in the Dare to be Digital competition.
